description: This is just a GUI for already existing youtube-dl great app, which is CLI only. Can download video or audio, can select entire playlist or just a song. Overall, good application.

ERROR: ERROR: ffprobe/avprobe and ffmpeg/avconv not found. Please install one.

PROS

- Fast
- Easy
- Simple UI

CONS

- The audio quality in the audio extract is terrible. Somebody else said this was a lot better than youtube-dl, and for downloading videos it might be. But if you are looking to grab audio from videos, don't waste your time. The audio quality is so bad it will hurt your ears.

description: Now i see a message on here that says end-of-life: youtube-dl disabled. Does this mean that this will no longer work. When i try to download videos they dont work now because it says youtube-dl disabled.  I just wish they were more straight forward. So should i be erasing this off my comptuer or not? Either way I cant take anything away from that fact that this thing worked amaizng thats why im still giving it the 5 stars. I guess im also misleading others considering it does not work anymore. Wish i had more info on what happend and if there is going to be a fix or if i should be searching for a different one. that would be nice. to have some feedback

I have been using this app for a long time with no problems. It suddenly quit working so I went to my desktop to try to download the video I wanted but that didn't work also. I discovered Ubuntu had update yesterday and a new version of "Youtube-dl" was included in the update. I removed and reinstalled Video Downloader, that fixed both computers.

This will do the job of ANT video downloader, but you cannot stack up downloads. For best results open as many windows as you wish, add the desired URL to each of them, BUT only activate one download. After the first download is completed, choose another one to download. This process usually result in successful downloads, regardless of the size of the resulting MP4 file.
	If this could be set and forget automated, it would garner five stars.

si pide el paquete youtube-dl solo tienen que ir ala terminal y escriben sudo apt install youtube-dl en debian y ubuntu y derivados , si les pide el paquete  FFmpeg solo ponen sudo apt install ffmpeg en debian y derivados de nuevo si es en FEDORA ponen sudo dnf install ffmpeg y para actualizarlo sudo dnf upgrade ffmpeg. solo cambian en los comandos apt o dnf dependiendo si estan en debian /ubuntu o fedora.

description:
Facil, 
le pones el link del video, y te lo descarga.
Descarga incluso listas de reproducción solo con el link! Me encantó!

En definitiva es una de las mejores aplicaciones de descarga que he utilizado. Super ligero, te baja casi desde cualquier página, sólo hay que colocar el link de descarga correcto. Ultra rápido, mientras las descargas en otras aps tardan bastante o se detienen o se cortan, con esta bajas todo en cuentión de minutos, casi segundos en algunos casos. Mientras las integradas a Firefox sólo te permiten descargas hasta 480px en su mayoría, con esta puedes descargar en la resolución que quieras. Te carga también de manera automática los subtítulos tanto en inglés como en español o los lenguajes que tengas por default en tu navegador. Una herramienta absulotamente indispensable para todos aquellos que amamos descargar archivos de video y verlos en donde queramos, en lugar de gastar ancho de anda y dinero con el streaming. 1000% recomendable.
Facil y genial la mejor aplicación para vajar videos.
